Based on [this](https://mc-stan.org/docs/2_25/stan-users-guide/measurement-error-models.html).

```{r}
library(cmdstanr)
```

```{r}
sim = cmdstan_model("stanModels/stanCaseStudies/sho_stim.stan")
```

```{r}
sim_data <- sim$sample(data = list(T = 11, 
                              y0 = c(1, 0), 
                              t0 = 0,
                              ts = 1:11,
                              theta = .4))
```

```{r}
str(sim_data)
```
